title: Incompatible
body: Can someone please help me, today i tried to play league but when it started up there was an error saying that "Its not designed to run on windows or it contains a error" when i looked further into it, there was a issue that said "Incompatible Program" I've played league on this for quite a while. What should I do pls help.

replies.body: Do you have a screenshot of this error?  Where exactly is it happening, and what are you doing at that time?  Are you using the updated client? More important question -- Are yon on Mac? Let me know!
